Title: Pindorama
Writer: Antônio Calmon, Arnaldo Jabor (idea and script), Arnaldo Jabor
Actors: Maurício do Valle, Ítala Nandi, Jesus Pingo, Hugo Carvana
Plot: In the Sixteenth Century, in Brazil, the founder of Pindorama realizes that nobody works in the anarchic village. When the king arrives in town, there is a fight for power among the governor and politicians while the alienated people composed of Caucasians, Blacks, and Indians follow their leaders without any political awareness.
